attributes.action: Primary schools to disclose info about convicted sex offenders & peadophiles
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a law for primary schools to have a scheme like Sarah's law to disclose information to concerned parents about other parents of children in their class who are violent convicted sex offenders, paedophile, on the sex offenders register or has been. Children could be at risk if they were to go on a play date sleep over or days out with a parent who's a threat to them. Parents need to know to safeguard their child/children
Our children have a right to be safe.
attributes.background: A scheme to be in place for primary schools to be able to disclose information about a parent who could be a risk to their child. If their child is in same class as your child & could be invited round for a play date sleep over on holiday that child could be at risk & parents need to know.
